subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Zlatan Ibrahimovic's second-half soccer goal gave Barcelona a 1-0 win at Mallorca on Saturday and a three-point lead over Real Madrid atop the Spanish League.
snippet: Zlatan Ibrahimovic's second-half soccer goal gave Barcelona a 1-0 win at Mallorca on Saturday and a three-point lead over Real Madrid atop the Spanish League.
